Trader of the Valley Kitzka:
A Piece of Bone Huge a Dragon need for call powerful dancers.
In different places of the Dragon Valley, there are 4 Draconically Vortex. If you go there and apply this object, you can call one of the following Raid Monsters: Emerald Horn, Rider Dust Storm, Bleeding Fly, Black Blade, Summoner Shadows, Spiked Tormentor and Mighty Fuse.
You can get this Fragment from undead and dragons from the Dragon Valley.
